descrition: I am a passionate and highly motivated software developer with a diverse background in web development and a strong focus on creating exceptional digital solutions. Over the years, I've had the privilege of working with a range of forward-thinking companies, honing my skills and gaining valuable experience that has shaped me into the developer I am today.
workXPDescription: Here is a quick summary of my most recent experiences:

workXP.description: I worked on Bradesco projects in the Credit Recovery Department, both on the Platform for operators and on the User-focused Portal, in a multidisciplinary team. I worked on building and maintaining the initial versions of the project, focusing on Next.js/Redux Toolkit as the interface base using MUI for the components, along with unit tests to ensure the integrity of the interface.

I am tasked with overseeing the creation and maintenance of the Library Component within the company, collaborating closely with our front-end developers. This involves direct collaboration with our design team and Stack Leaders to craft a scalable and functional Library intended for use across all our products. Apart from this i've work in multiple products in the company pontualy to implement new features and fix bugs

I was a technical reference in frontend, bringing technical and visual solutions to the developed product. I worked directly on the redesign of the Landing Page and initial development of the company's component library. I also worked on improving the SEO of the landing page. In addition to working on the ideation and development of SaaS and internal dashboard, I partially worked on the development of core features in node.js + express.js + mongo.db

As a Software Engineer, I had the responsibility to ensure that all technical solutions are aligned with the business strategy and product-related impacts using scalable architectures that ensure product quality integrity. I actively participated in the evolution of the team's technical skills and continuous improvement efforts that impact other teams. I worked directly on the development of the company's Design System and Component Library.

As a Front-End Developer, I worked on critical products for Samba's business and had the opportunity to learn from incredible people and embrace new challenges as I developed. I contributed to the creation and evolution of products developed for large companies using Sambatech platforms. I learned to develop myself using cutting-edge technologies, in an efficient and scalable way.

I actively participated in the idealization, planning and development stages of our clients' products. I also participated in the discussion of the technologies that were used in the projects. I learned how to develop responsive web applications with React.js, consuming web services, based on layouts made by our designers, aiming for an excellent UX.

I worked as an intern at IWWA, where I learned about full stack web development using PHP and Wordpress for the back-end, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Jquery, Sass and Gulp for the front-end in website development and maintenance.

education.course: Technologist in Systems Analysis and Development

contactMe.descripton: What’s next? Feel free to reach out to me if you're looking for a developer, have a query, or simply want to connect.
